finalizeDeposit.code: function finalizeDeposit(address _l1Token, address _l2Token, address _from, address _to, uint256 _amount, bytes _data) external nonpayable

_l1Token.description: Address for the l1 token this is called with

_l2Token.description: Address for the l2 token this is called with

_from.description: Account to pull the deposit from on L2.

_to.description: Address to receive the withdrawal at

_amount.description: Amount of the token to withdraw

_data.description: Data provider by the sender on L1. This data is provided        solely as a convenience for external contracts. Aside from enforcing a maximum        length, these contracts provide no guarantees about its content.

finalizeDeposit.details: Complete a deposit from L1 to L2, and credits funds to the recipient's balance of this L2 token. This call will fail if it did not originate from a corresponding deposit in L1StandardTokenBridge.

_0.description: Address of the corresponding L1 bridge contract.

l1TokenBridge.details: get the address of the corresponding L1 bridge contract.

withdraw.code: function withdraw(address _l2Token, uint256 _amount, uint32 _l1Gas, bytes _data) external nonpayable

_l2Token.description: Address of L2 token where withdrawal was initiated.

_amount.description: Amount of the token to withdraw. param _l1Gas Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.

_data.description: Optional data to forward to L1. This data is provided        solely as a convenience for external contracts. Aside from enforcing a maximum        length, these contracts provide no guarantees about its content.

withdraw.details: initiate a withdraw of some tokens to the caller's account on L1

withdrawTo.code: function withdrawTo(address _l2Token, address _to, uint256 _amount, uint32 _l1Gas, bytes _data) external nonpayable

_l2Token.description: Address of L2 token where withdrawal is initiated.

_to.description: L1 adress to credit the withdrawal to.

_amount.description: Amount of the token to withdraw. param _l1Gas Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.

_data.description: Optional data to forward to L1. This data is provided        solely as a convenience for external contracts. Aside from enforcing a maximum        length, these contracts provide no guarantees about its content.

withdrawTo.details: initiate a withdraw of some token to a recipient's account on L1.

DepositFailed.code: event DepositFailed(address indexed _l1Token, address indexed _l2Token, address indexed _from, address _to, uint256 _amount, bytes _data)

DepositFinalized.code: event DepositFinalized(address indexed _l1Token, address indexed _l2Token, address indexed _from, address _to, uint256 _amount, bytes _data)

WithdrawalInitiated.code: event WithdrawalInitiated(address indexed _l1Token, address indexed _l2Token, address indexed _from, address _to, uint256 _amount, bytes _data)
